name.namePart: Printed in Paris by La Courriere

mods.abstract: The subject is that of a rather tough-looking woman from the market district in ParisThe artist felt she was typical of those "ladies" who were frequently seen in this area of the city.
mods.note: The print is an etching using the standardlift ground technique on a copper plateThe work was printed first in black and white on cream-toned paperTo add warmth, a light red color was applied by hand.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.)Museum of Art

titleInfo.title: Caroline Wogan Durieux Works of Art
